body:
Hello, fellow Avicus user!
In this forum game you have to answer the question above you and ask one for the next person to answer. Pretty simple :3
Have fun!
My question: Do you like a sphere or cube more and why?

-Love, Goldie

replies.body:
Never have a cold drink

hostile mobs or peaceful mobs?
replies.body_tagged:
Never have a cold drink

hostile mobs or peaceful mobs?

replies.body:
Hostile-- you get most of the good stuff you need from them.
You could play a whole world without the need of peaceful mobs because all they give you is food.
If you have skeletons and no pigs, you could just kill the skeletons, make bone meal, make a farm, and have a surplus of food. You also need a blaze rods and ender pearls to beat the Ender Dragon, sooo.. xD
Always live half the time in complete sadness and half the time in complete happiness, or never feel happiness or sadness?
replies.body_tagged:
Hostile-- you get most of the good stuff you need from them.
You could play a whole world without the need of peaceful mobs because all they give you is food.
If you have skeletons and no pigs, you could just kill the skeletons, make bone meal, make a farm, and have a surplus of food. You also need a blaze rods and ender pearls to beat the Ender Dragon, sooo.. xD
Always live half the time in complete sadness and half the time in complete happiness, or never feel happiness or sadness?

replies.body:
No one is replying because your question is too complex >-< really gets people thinking o.O
I think I would choose to live half sad and half happy because from my sadness I can learn from the mistakes I had made to get to the happier part of my life.

Well: would you rather eat a spider or a butterfly? :o
